dict.acceptation: 差别，差异；[数]差数，差额；意见分歧；特色；

sent.orig: Difference of age and difference of temperament occasion difference of sentiment.
sent.trans: 年龄不同，气质不同，看法也就会不同。

sent.orig: Difference of age and difference of temperament occasion difference of sen timent.
sent.trans: 年令不同，气质不同，看法也就会不同。

sent.orig: This includes the existence-uniqueness of finite difference solution and the convergence of finite difference solutionsolution.
sent.trans: 对所建立的非线性差分格式给出解的存在唯一性，收敛性等定性性质。

sent.orig: Climate characteristics: large temperature difference between day, the temperature difference in small, distinct and dry seasons.
sent.trans: 气候特点：日温差大，年温差小，干湿季节分明。

sent.orig: Analyze counting difference, submit analyze report, and control counting difference.
sent.trans: 分析盘点差异，按要求提交差异分析报告，推进盘点差异的控制。
